project_descr: Piloting Natural Resource Valuation within Environmental Impact Assessments - PIMS 3619

outputs.output_title: Piloting NRV in EIA in Jamaica
outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to develop natural resource valuation (financial and economic) tools to be used to strengthen a holistic approach to the implementation of policies, programmes, plans and development projects.  In particular, the project will incorporate natural resource valuation tools in the implementation of the Strategic Environmental Assessments (SEA), ensuring that governmental development policies are better informed of environmental values (i.e., biodiversity conservation, environmentally sound and sustainable land management, and climate change mitigation and adaptation

project_title: piloting natural resource valuation in eias in jamaica
